name: Slackin
description: Let people invite themselves to your Slack

SLACK_API_TOKEN.description: A Slack API token (find it on https://api.slack.com/web)

SLACK_CHANNEL.description: Name of a single guest channel to invite them to (leave blank for a normal, all-channel invite)

SLACK_RESTRICT.description: If it's a restricted account or not (default it's false)
